messages.subject: Tokugawa clan
messages.msgSnippet: I am trying to find information about a samuri, Matsudaira Nagakazu, from Omni province. He was a samuri in Edo period during reign of shogun Tokugawa leharu.
messages.messageBody:
I am trying to find information about a samuri, Matsudaira Nagakazu,
from Omni province. He was a samuri in Edo period during reign of
shogun Tokugawa leharu. Are ther any sites or books about Matsudaira
Nagakazu that I can find in depth information (in English) about him?
Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks
